description.english: It's time for a change.
This time, you'll call the shots.
You know what you want, and you know how to get it.
What other way to prove yourself?
They will never suspect.
Better safe than sorry.
Solitude is soothing.
You might need a good alibi.
If you've got the money, why not use it?
Old habits die hard. The best way of staying hidden is to be the person nobody looks twice at.
This is a new lease on life, why not allow yourself to have a good time? Finally?
A door has opened.
Something is coming.
A pain. Migraine? It's suddenly hard to breathe.
You didn't plan it like this.
The time for secrets is over.
You've made this mistake once, not again.
It's an easy job, right?
You saved the civilians in Carter's mansion with Marshal Steel.
You're not the one in over their head.
Making Lady Argent kill a civilian is a low blow, but she should have been more careful.
You wish the fight on the bridge would have gone better, but at least you are alive.
Will you stay for the press?
Captain Blaze of the Guardians wasn't as tough as he thought he was.
You've got everything planned.
Having Captain Blaze in your corner might be useful in the future.

displayName.english: Cat on A Hot Tin Roof

description.english: Captain Blaze doesn't lead the Guardians for nothing. Ouch.
This needs a personal touch.
Some things are better done incognito.
Your time in the spotlight.
Dressed to impress.
Not the right kind of game.
Caution is overrated.
This is how it's done.
Oh no. Oh NO. The Catastrofiend is back!
Fighting the Catastrofiend is a bad idea, but, by now, you're very good at bad ideas.
You don't know what you did in Jake's mind, but it sure was something.
Better safe than sorry.
You're both in a similar position.
You're not one to back down.
Not everyone can say they've kicked the Kingpin of Los Diablos in the face. Now you can.
You've been saved by the Rat King, they've got your back!
Allies are better than enemies.
Who is trying to snipe you? Or is it Ortega they were after?
What are the red threads Hollow Ground tried to entangle you with?
You've been in Hollow Ground's mindscape… right?
Something strange is going on in the skies over Los Diablos.
You've hidden your tracks well.
Best friends… forever?
Are you truly you?
At least you're alive, right? For now.
You got out at the last moment, time to rescue yourself.
What are you doing here? You need to get out of your puppet.
Good thing you avoided going to Hollow Ground. Now you just need to get your puppet back.
You can afford to be generous.
Petty but practical.
Something smells here…
The hottest property in town.
It's fixable. Hopefully…
Sabotage of a different sort.
A place you never thought you'd visit.
Nobody saw this coming.
Making enemies doesn't pay.
If at first you don't succeed, keep pushing.
It's different this way.
This takes trust.
Time to deal with your ghosts.
Baring more than your heart.
It was never meant to go on for this long.
A token of affection.
The couch is new.
Of course, it would have to be there.
The pastel is a surprise.
No surprises here.
Helping out an old friend?
Ortega revealed some wild theories about you and Hollow Ground.
Not your usual paparazzi.
You might as well pretend that Ortega's theories are correct and work them to your advantage.
Stay under the radar.
Fame at any cost.
You've gotten callous.
Are you sure you want to do this?
Stay focused.
Your scars are fading.
A countryside vacation.
Someone's on your side, at least.
One of the Rangers trusted you enough to break you out of the hospital, even though they knew you were the villain.
You saved your puppet with Dr. Mortum but got backstabbed in return.
Be practical.
Dr. Mortum sent Sky-Raider to break you out of the hospital.
You're still in your puppet, and you're also under arrest. This is not good.
Take care of your own.
Shared pasts.
The memory of Anathema still haunts you.
